entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
